youtube_video_description: The video titled "Optical illusion image contrast subverts your perception of vision" likely explores various optical illusions that play with color and contrast, demonstrating how these illusions can trick the viewer's perception. The video may showcase different images and possibly animations that illustrate these concepts, encouraging viewers to challenge their understanding of visual perception. Given that it is about optical illusions, there may be comparisons of colors and lengths of visual elements, such as long strips, to highlight how perception can be misleading.
hint_prompt: In the video, consider the optical illusions presented and try to determine which color of the long strips appears to be the shortest based on visual contrast and perception.
